akas: La bella y las bestias (original title)
The Beauty and the Beasts World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: La bella y las bestias (original title)
The Beauty and the Beasts World-wide (English title)

1.title: El principio de la vengaza

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Enrique successfully carries out the operation to discover Quintero's business. Juan Pablo learns that Quintero and his partners want to eliminate Enrique. Quintero's men kidnap Enrique and murder his wife.

2.title: Actos de venganza

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The kidnapping of Enrique's family spins out of control and Bela witnesses the death of her parents. Bela tries to save María and attacks Armando, but things don't go as planned.

3.title: Traicionado

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Juan Pablo feels guilty and gives Bella a video with the truth about her father's death. Emanuel advises Armando on how to proceed with Bela, but executes a plan behind his back.

4.title: Plan perfecto

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Juan Pablo's family have to deal with Armando's death. Bela investigates the identities of Armando's partners to get revenge. Emanuel assaults Bela and Juan Pablo to force her to leave Mexico.

5.title: Entrenamiento

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Juan Pablo returns to the federal police. Mike starts training Bela to help her get revenge. Emanuel is responsible for María's disappearance and gives Norman and Castor part of the Quintero casino.

6.title: El ahorcado

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Bela helps Penélope get revenge for what happened when she was a little girl. Juan Pablo tries to find a way to open an investigation into Castor. Emanuel retires from the casino.

7.title: El rey rosado

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Bela's revenge plan begins with a plot to rob Castor's casino. Bela infiltrates the casino to investigate. Juan Pablo and the Policía Federal find Castor's drug cargo.

8.title: El vigilante

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: When Castor escapes from the federal police and hides at his ranch, Bela plans a way to get his attention. Juan Pablo suspects Bela is trying to evade the law in favor of vigilante justice.

9.title: Caída libre

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: The race to catch Castor beings. Bela and Juan Pablo's plans change drastically when Norman unexpectedly shows up at the ranch.

10.title: Error de cálculo

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Bela runs into danger because of the GPS locator Juan Pablo left in her suitcase. Penélope and Mike share an intimate moment. Felipe pays the consequences for the operation failing. Juan Pablo discovers that Norman is his kidnapper.

11.title: Primera baja

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Bela executes her revenge plot against Castor, but Norman traps her. Patricia finds out Emilia has not been attending university. Ricardo informs Emanuel that Bela is at Castor's ranch.

12.title: Encubrimiento

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: Bela tells Emanuel that she is prepared to get revenge for her parents' death with her bare hands. Junior begins to look for Bela to kill her. Emanuel finds Norman and intends to help him.

13.title: El héroe

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Juan Pablo kisses Bela. Junior sneaks into Bela's home to kill her, but she eliminates him first. Because of a phone call, the Federal Police know about the connection between Norman and Junior, and Emanuel has to take care of the matter.

14.title: Socio incómodo

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: Emanuel takes custody of Norman to stay in control. Juan Pablo breaks up with Teresa because of what he feels for Bela. Horacio calls a society meeting to determine Norman's future.

15.title: Segundo caído

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: La Sociedad and Bela arm a separate operative to kill Norman, but Emanuel's intervention changes everything. Emilia starts working as Emanuel's assistant.

16.title: El Alcalde

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: Bela and her team look for Hoarcio's weak point. Mike gets to know Mauricio, leader of the movement against the mayor. Bela and her team enter Horacio's house to kill him, but Mauricio's presence puts the mission in danger.

17.title: Corrupción en rojo

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

17.plot: Mireya fails and Juan Pablo gets involved in the investigation into Mauricio. Bela begins to get closer to Horacio and uses a costume to infiltrate his house.

18.title: Segunda noche

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

18.plot: Juan Pablo and Bela confess their feelings for one another. Juan Pablo asks for Bela's help with Mireya's case, but Ricardo opposes the idea. Bela continues getting closer to Horacio, but Juan Pablo's presence puts her at risk.

19.title: Cazando a la bestia

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

19.plot: Ricardo warns Juan Pablo to stay away from Bela. Horacio's men launch an attack on Mauricio and his people. Juan Pablo cannot find proof to implicate Horacio in Mireya and Mauricio's deaths.

20.title: La cueva de Las bestias

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

20.plot: The relationship between Juan Pablo and Bela becomes stronger. Horacio introduces Bela to the members of the Society. Horacio tells his associates that the Federal Police is investigating him, but they do not seem to support him.

21.title: Tercer caído

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

21.plot: The investigation into the lynching of Julián continues and Horacio's men are the first to fall. Bela attacks Horacio after he tries to kill her, but a violent mob interrupts their fight and the mayor is lynched.

22.title: La Madame

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

22.plot: Juan Pablo asks Bela to let him trap the society members, but she continues with her vengeance and begins a plan to infiltrate and ruin the life of 'La Madame'.

23.title: La hoguera de las vanidades

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

23.plot: Bela attacks La Madame's vanity and succeeds in infiltrating her auto agency. Emilia is missing and Emanuel starts a desperate search. La Madame asks Emanuel to investigate Bela.

24.title: Ataque sin cuartel

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

24.plot: Simón interrogates Penélope about the death of her stepfather. Bela places several microphones in La Madame's house, but an attack from Omar forces her to leave. La Madame fires Bela from the agency.

25.title: Mujer fatal

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

25.plot: Bela recommends Penélope as one of the 'Madame Girls'. Juan Pablo still believes that Bela and Penelope are suspects in Horacio's case. The ex-employees of La Madame demand compensation.

26.title: Descubierta

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

26.plot: Bela meets with Omar to approach him and investigate more about his past. Mike confesses to Penelope that he likes her, but that he can not sustain a relationship with her. Juan Pablo is disappointed to discover Bela in the Madame's agency.

27.title: Sospechas

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

27.plot: Due to the suspicions of Juan Pablo and Simón, Madame and Omar begin to suspect of Bela and Penelope. Mike and Bela manage to intervene in Madame's computer but he advises her that it is best to withdraw from the mission.

28.title: Eternamente joven

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

28.plot: The Madame believes that Penelope is allied with the Federal Police and Omar is responsible for following them. Bela continues with her plan to make Madame believe that Mike is a successful dermatologist. Bela and her team steal a shipment of cars.

29.title: Belleza que mata

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

29.plot: Mike and Bela empty the account of the Madame and prepare to give her the rejuvenating treatment. Penelope is kidnapped and Omar is responsible for torturing her. Juan Pablo and Simón are surprised to find the stolen cars.

30.title: Cuarto caído

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

30.plot: Bela causes the Madame to commit suicide by leaving her disfigured. The members of the Society begin to feel paranoid and believe that the culprit of the deaths is one of them. Bela causes Juan Pablo to be fired from the Federal Police.

31.title: Cacería de bestias

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

31.plot: The members of the Society make sure that Juan Pablo is not a threat to them. The Society intends to take advantage of the relationship between Emilia and Emanuel. Juan Pablo decides to join the hunting of the beasts.

32.title: El Colombiano

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

32.plot: Penelope is not comfortable with the way Bela is leading the mission since she is not making any profit. Juan Pablo appears before Antonio to ask for work. Antonio sends his trusted wife, Andrea, to approach Emilia.

33.title: Exceso de confíaza

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

33.plot: Bela arrives at Antonio's company to apply as an administrative assistant. Antonio plans to test Juan Pablo to make him commit a crime. Emmanuel and Emilia announce their relationship to Juan Pablo and Bela.

34.title: Conversión

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

34.plot: Bela is rejected by Antonio's company and Penelope takes her place. Bela and Antonio are jealous of the chemistry between Andrea and Juan Pablo. Andrea orders Juan Pablo to get false identifications for some models.

35.title: La décíma musa

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

35.plot: Emanuel meets with the Society to demand the return of Emilia's casino shares. Antonio takes Verónica and Susy to his house to select one of them as the tenth model that he promised to Andrea.

36.title: El seductor

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

36.plot: Bela travels to Colombia to obtain information about one of the missing models and discovers Antonio's way of operating, while Verónica is about to suffer the same fate as the other models.

37.title: Reina secuestrada

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

37.plot: Bela discovers that Andrea helped Alejandra escape from the brothel where Antonio has the other models locked up. Antonio's men attack Bela and Alejandra. The teams of Bela and Juan Pablo decide to work together.

38.title: Mujer precavida

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

38.plot: Bela tries to get political asylum for Alejandra. Jamachi presses Simon to tell him the truth about the Colombian's case. Andrea begins to monitor Penelope and investigate about the woman who has been hanging around the Society.

39.title: La verdadera reina

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

39.plot: Andrea begins to suspect that Bela and Isabella from Colombia are the same person. The situation becomes complicated for Juan Pablo when Antonio turns him into his security chief and takes him to his brothel.

40.title: Hasta el cuello

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

40.plot: Veronica ends up drowned after arguing with Susi for Antonio's photos. The Society officially welcomes Emilia to their circle. Juan Pablo asks Yamile to help him in order to save the brothel models.

41.title: Plan coordinado

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

41.plot: Antonio asks Emanuel for help to get rid of Verónica's body, while Susi ends up in the brothel. Due to Andrea's suspicions, Bela's team withdrew from the mission. Ricardo detains Andrea to put pressure on Antonio.

42.title: En las redes

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

42.plot: Antonio is desperate to free Andrea from the federals and turns to Juan Pablo, who asks him to return to his business as a partner. Bela discovers that Emanuel has a connection to the Society.

43.title: Uniendo puntos

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

43.plot: Juan Pablo asks Antonio to let him be Susi's first client and puts Pascual to watch over them. Andrea tries to convince Antonio that Juan Pablo is looking to hurt him and stops him. Emanuel warns Isabela that she may be in danger.

44.title: Quinto Caído

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

44.plot: Juan Pablo manages to communicate with Simón and sends the location of the brothel. The final confrontation between Bela and Antonio takes place inside the tiger cage. Bela gives Andrea another chance and Emanuel arrives at Antonio's house.

45.title: Diamente en bruto

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

45.plot: Bela is affected after knowing what Juan Pablo had to do to save the models. Cristina meets Emilia to give her a welcome gift. Emilia has her first meeting with the society and makes a mistake.

46.title: Aliados

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

46.plot: Juan Pablo looks for the way that Andrea cooperates with the Federal Police and offers immunity. Cristina begins to get tired of having to take care of Carlos, her husband. A person from the past reappears in Mike's life.

47.title: Nueva táctica

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

47.plot: Juan Pablo and Andrea travel to Colombia to reconnect with the models. Cristina begins to show interest to Jorge, one of her employees. Hector commits suicide leaving Mike tormented by his death. Bela comes in contact with Cristina.

48.title: Sin máscaras

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

48.plot: Bela decides not to hide anymore and presents herself directly to Cristina to intimidate her. Emanuel asks Emilia for marriage. Emanuel discovers that Bela has evidence against the society.

49.title: Cambio de juego

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

49.plot: Cristina sends Jorge to attack Bela and Mike ends up in the hospital. Penelope goes to work as Carlos's nurse. Juan Pablo tries to convince Emilia of the mistake she is making by marrying Emanuel and keeping the casino's shares.

50.title: Entre la espada y la pared

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

50.plot: Patricia tries to find evidence against Emanuel. Cristina shows Abelardo and Ignacio the video that Bela gave her and they realize that she is responsible for the death of the other members, so they ask Emanuel for help to stop her.

51.title: Prisionera

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

51.plot: Juan Pablo puts Bela under arrest for Antonio's death in order to keep her under surveillance. Emanuel seeks a test to link Bela with the death of one of the partners. Cristina continues with her attempts to seduce Jorge.

52.title: Desilusiones

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

52.plot: Mike demands that Bela overcome her break up with Juan Pablo in order to continue with the plan. Patricia shows a couple of tests to Emilia so that she realizes that Emanuel had business with his father. Carlos asks Cristina for a divorce.

53.title: Profecías

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

53.plot: Bela puts into action her plan against Cristina and interrupts Juan Pablo's operation. Emilia talks to Patricia about how she feels about Emanuel. Penelope generates chaos at Carlos's house by exposing Jorge's deception.

54.title: Sexto caído

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

54.plot: Bela takes Cristina inside her own mine leaving her without air. Mike asks Simon for help in rescuing Penelope. Abelardo discovers that Ignacio and his family are engaged in collecting immigrants to later hunt them.

55.title: El sabio

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

55.plot: The remaining members of the Society seek to divert Bela's attention and Ignacio decides to appear before her. Emilia terrified by what she has discovered about the partners tells Emanuel that she is willing to return her shares.

56.title: Juego mental

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

56.plot: Emilia suffers a crisis and does not know what to do with her life. Simon falls into the game of Abelardo and is accused of blackmail. Bela discovers that Ignacio has leukemia and he tries to convince her with arguments that he is really sorry.

57.title: Estrategias

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

57.plot: Bela decides to enter Ignacio's mental game while Abelardo continues to try to corrupt Simon. Emilia ends her relationship with Emanuel. Ignacio hires Ramiro to develop synthetic marijuana.

58.title: Reuniones forzadas

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

58.plot: Emanuel launches his plan to get Emilia back and kills Patricia. Mike seeks to become head of security for Ignacio's lands and discovers his bizarre way of having fun. Bela meets with Juan Pablo at his mother's funeral.

59.title: Doble filo

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

59.plot: Bela tells Juan Pablo that he should give himself the opportunity with someone else. Ramiro gives Daniel the first dose of synthetic marijuana and gets sick. Mike and Simón meet at Ignacio's ranch and question their loyalties.

60.title: Séptimo caído

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

60.plot: Mike's life is in danger when he is discovered by Bonifacio. Bela's team and Ignacio's team face each other in a duel to the death in the hunting area. Abelardo demands the head of Ignacio's murderer and Juan Pablo blames himself.

61.title: El político

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

61.plot: Ricardo puts Juan Pablo free and Abelardo gets him fired from the police. Bela decides to deliver the video to the Senate but before shows it to Emanuel. Abelardo tries to make the Senate believe that the video is a montage to harm him.

62.title: Contraataque

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

62.plot: Emanuel confirms to the Senate that the video for which Abelardo is indicted is a montage. Abelardo begins to gather people close to his former partners to coordinate an attack against Bela. Emanuel confesses to Emilia that Chucho is his son.

63.title: Ataque sin tregua

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

63.plot: The coordinated attack of Abelardo begins to take effect and Mike is the first to fall. Graciela exposes her marital problems before the media and Abelardo decides to kill her. Penelope asks Bela to desist from her revenge.

64.title: La penúltima bestia

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

64.plot: Marcia fails in her attempt to kill Graciela. Abelardo discovers Emanuel's plan to kill him and it is Emilia who is responsible for finishing the job. Ricardo discovers that La Sombra is Emmanuel, but he can not reveal it.

65.title: Juego de sombras

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

65.plot: Bela and Juan Pablo deduce that Emmanuel is La Sombra. Emanuel begins to corral Bela using the press and the Federal Police. Bela tries to know if Chuchito is the son of María and Emanuel.

66.title: La última bestia

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beasts (TV Series 2018– )

66.plot: Bela and Emanuel face each other face to face, the situation gets out of control and her life is in danger. Juan Pablo arrives in time to save Bela, but he can not stop Emilia from hurting her.

imdb.plot outline: The series revolves around Isabela León (Esmeralda Pimentel), a beautiful young girl whose parents were murdered by a group of white-collar criminals when she was a minor. After reaching the age of majority, Isabela, with great resentment, decides to take charge of her situation and face the murderers of her parents, whom she calls Bestias, members of high society, who hide their crimes under facades of businesses or activities legal. In the company of her great fighting companions, Mike (Jorge Alberti) and Penélope (Cassandra Sánchez Navarro), Isabela returns from Los Angeles to Mexico to hunt, one by one, the Bestias that do not stop enjoying the honeys of impunity.
imdb.title: The Beauty and the Beasts
plot: The series revolves around Isabela León (Esmeralda Pimentel), a beautiful young girl whose parents were murdered by a group of white-collar criminals when she was a minor. After reaching the age of majority, Isabela, with great resentment, decides to take charge of her situation and face the murderers of her parents, whom she calls Bestias, members of high society, who hide their crimes under facades of businesses or activities legal. In the company of her great fighting companions, Mike (Jorge Alberti) and Penélope (Cassandra Sánchez Navarro), Isabela returns from Los Angeles to Mexico to hunt, one by one, the Bestias that do not stop enjoying the honeys of impunity.
